title: Discussion
text:
Formats

StandardisationISOS


Promoting good practices



Using ISO standards: Date and time and Extended Date/Time Format (EDTF) Specification https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:std:iso:8601:-2:ed-1:v1:en, https://www.loc.gov/standards/datetime/





EDTF is an extension of the previously seen ISO-8601 Date format. It allows an accurate record of time events and durations whatever their fuzzyness (seasons, before, etc.)
